Public Remarks: Great home for the first-time buyer or investor. This 3-bedroom house is located on a large private fenced lot close to schools and shopping. Many updates include the kitchen, flooring, paint and furnace. Unfinished basement awaits your final finishing.

Great value and lots of room for the value-conscious buyer that does not wish to compromise on location. That original mobile home is 450sqft, with the rest of the home being a large addition set on a PW foundation and a full concrete basement under the mobile home section of the building. The yard is a fantastic mix of gardens, sheds, and lawn, while providing privacy from neighbors because of the creek and riparian zones on 2 sides of the property. A little TLC on the interior of the original mobile and you will have a very comfortable place to call home. The roof is supported by concrete pillars and covers the entire structure. There is 1 bedroom on the main floor and 1 downstairs in the basement.

Corner lot in quiet cul-de-sac. Split entry home, single car garage. Side fenced yard with shed. 3 bedrooms on main, master with 2pc ensuite bath. Kitchen has had some updates to countertops and cabinets. Laminate flooring. Living room with wood-burning fireplace. Daylight basement is partially finished with large family room, 2 more bedrooms, laundry, and storage. Includes appliances. Furnace approximately 10 years old. Roof back half 2014. Home currently tenant occupied.

Over 2 acres centrally located in the much sought after Interlakes area of the South Cariboo. This park like property has the driveway in to a cleared and level building site, high producing drilled well, 2 yard hydrants, hydro with 200 amp service underground to building site plus a storage shed on the property with hydro. Minutes away from dozens of great fishing lakes, and direct access to the massive trail system this area offers. This property also backs onto Crown Land with Bridge Creek meandering through. Bring your building plans and you're ready to go, or just camp out and enjoy the great outdoors. Vendor may finance. L#8469
This R2 lot is located in the SE part of the city surrounded by new construction and is walking distance to Duncan Cran Elementary and the Senior High School.

This is a fixer upper with many projects started but few finished. You will love the floor plan as the main floor kitchen dining area has been opened up and hall way eliminated. The kitchen was replaced a few years ago with beautiful white cabinets and a stylish counter top. There is enough sq ft of new laminate flooring sitting in boxes just wailing for you. The backyard area is west facing with a large PW sundeck & is fully fenced. The upper floor gives you 3 bdrms and a 4 pc bath for a growing family but does need a far amount of repairs. The basement is unfinished and just waiting for some great ideas to finish. This is a great opportunity to put a little sweat equity into a properly & realize a great return on your effort.
Realtor Remarks: Please forewarn your clients of damaged ceilings from leaks, a leaking hose to the wash machine down stairs and substantial clutter. Please look beyond these issues to see the real value, as resent sale in this complex have been as high as 174,000.
